website_summaries.verdict: Pricey yet competitive, this tough, quality-made tool appeals to amateurs and professionals alike. It's the best on the market.
Lug nuts and suspension bolts alike fall before this wrench’s steady, powerful torque. A favorite among DIYers for its reliability and fast-charging battery.
pros: A reliable, powerful impact wrench with good low-torque mode and a variable-speed trigger
Battery charges within an hour and holds the charge
cons: Switching between modes can be awkward
Wrench is heavier and larger than others
Some users find torque settings too high or too low

customer_reviews.title: Awesome impact
customer_reviews.text: I've had this impact set for 2 months now and it is a bad ass impact. I work at a car dealership as a technician and this impact is very comparable with my air impact and can break loose just about any bolt I throw at it. It feels solid and the 5.0 amp hour batteries last a long time and charge in just over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It takes a little getting used to....
customer_reviews.text: While I received my impact in a new case with two batteries, one of them failed after the first use. I e-mailed aSavings about the problem and never heard back from them. They may give a fair price, but follow through on defective product was not good. I will not have that problem next time at Lowe's. Their service is excellent. Lesson learned !
customer_reviews.author: wildfire

customer_reviews.title: This Milwaukee nothing but the best! Clearly thought out from a professionals view point
customer_reviews.text: This Milwaukee nothing but the best! Clearly thought out from a professionals view point. No twist, no kick back, lite in weight, built to remove lugs and assorted bolts & nuts with ease. Never be without one again. Awesome impact and Torque!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Absolute MONSTER!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has power for days...literally. I use it sparingly and have put it on charger once in the last year. TONS of power. It's one of those things the avg. guy may not use much, but there is NO substitute when you need it. If you are someone who uses an impact wrench on a regular basis this can be your everyday go to piece. I was recommended this by a mechanic who has has his for 15 plus years. You cannot go wrong w/Milwaukee anything. Dewalt is good stuff, but it doesn't compare to Milwaukee stuff. Spend the extra, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: john newman

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband as he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband as he is always rebuilding or working on something. He goes to the junkyard a lot so he really needed this. It's a bit heavy, as to be expected, but gets the job done! He loves it! Update a year later: My husband LOVES this impact wrench....I think it's his favorite thing I have EVER bought him. Still working GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Great tools!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow!!!! What can I say that hasn’t probably been said 30 million times before?!?! Just WOW! This thing is awesome! We use it on the trails for our rzr’s to take tires on and off and any other issues we might run into. I also bought a Milwaukee kit with a 1/4 impact and drill that goes with us too and love all of it!! They have already paid for themselves in time and energy spent and I would highly recommend this AND the other kit for anyone looking for reliable, strong battery operated impacts. The batteries hold their charges like no others I’ve ever owned. (Dewalt and Makita)
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Must have for working on cars!
customer_reviews.text: This impact is amazing. I've had and been using this thing for about 9 months now. I haven't used it as much as I thought I would but still use it for working on me and my buddies cars. Mostly on the wheels to take them on and off quickly and for those stubborn bolts. I've even been on the same battery on wthe same charge from the day I got it. 6 months later and I've taken a ton of bolts off in that time. Make sure to get the impact adapter set to for from 1/2" to 3/8" sockets. That with this impact make this thing one of the most useful car tools you can have.
customer_reviews.author: Curt_32

customer_reviews.title: So far the one battery has been fine. We will order additional battery this spring when ...
customer_reviews.text: It states it comes with: 2 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)...it does NOT! It came with an extended pack (one) 5.0 battery. An additional battery will cost you about 83.00 bucks. My husband hasn't used it much since Christmas. So far the one battery has been fine. We will order additional battery this spring when he is doing more work on equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie R

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier. This is stronger than a ton of pneumatic ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal. After reading and watching reviews on this vs other impacts I pulled the trigger and bought this. I couldn't be happier. This is stronger than a ton of pneumatic impacts and every other battery impact as far as what I've learned about it. It took the axle nut off my Silverado with one quick squeeze of the trigger. If you work on cars and trucks this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: The Boss of tools
customer_reviews.text: As a professional Mechanic on heavy duty equipment and tractor trailer repairs I needed an impact gun that was both powerful and cordless/airless as I have to often be with out the use of a compressor or electricity. This Impact gun gets even the toughest rustieast nuts off. There was only a few occasions where I had to have a little aid from Heat to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ken the Mad

customer_reviews.title: I have been an automotive technician for over twenty years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been an automotive technician for over twenty years. I use this daily. It is an absolute beast of tool. Very very powerful. Much more power than any air impact I have ever owned. The battery lasts a long time, enough to take off and put on wheels all day long on one charge. The only negative thing is it's weight, it's heavy.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Better than Snap-on for much less money.
customer_reviews.text: Great impact gun! Powerful, long lasting battery. I think I like it more than my Snap-on. Actually, I do like it more than my Snap-on. The battery in my Snap-on died, and at $200, why not spend $400 and get a new BETTER gun with 2 batteries?! Then sell your old Snap-on that you wont use for $200. This thing is a workhorse, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a monster! It rips off the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster! It rips off the biggest and rustiest bolts. I’ve had it for 2 weeks and have used it multiple times and the battery is still on full charge. It is rather expensive up front, but if you are an experienced mechanic looking for an upgrade from regular hand tools, than look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I have to say its a BEAST! The ...
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say its a BEAST! The tool to have when going to the junk yard to get car parts fast. One battery charge lasted me 3 months with occasional use on one battery. Comes with 2 batteries and i'm not just on my 2nd battery with a 1/4 charge left still on the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Protools Inc is the way to go with these tools
customer_reviews.text: Protools Inc is great. Ordered this item and came even better then described. They have assured me that the Milwaukee warranty is valid through them. I will be buying all my tools through them. Unbelievable deals and customer service. Got back to me within the hour. +++++++
customer_reviews.author: Oskee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This tool is in no doubt a major investment, but a majorly good one too. Makes all sorts of DIY repairs simple and saves both backache, heartache and the periodic busted knuckle---two happy thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Horanano

customer_reviews.title: Mucho torque
customer_reviews.text: Ive been a dealership line tech for years and have bought many snap on battery operated guns and they last about 6 months and then are worthless,not to mention the snap on half inch drive doesn’t have much power brand new. This thing here is freaking amazing so much torque you wont be needing much more if so you’ll need a 3/4.but price is high but am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: But because I didn't feel like buying a giant and expensive air tank for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this instead of an air powered one. But because I didn't feel like buying a giant and expensive air tank for a project, I decided to give this a try. I was able to install all new suspension components on my Jeep with a single battery. This includes breaking all the rusted bolts free. This is probably the most valuable tool in my box now.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: This gun is beyond the greatest gun I have ever purchased it keeps on in ...
customer_reviews.text: This gun is beyond the greatest gun I have ever purchased it keeps on in pressing me and the batteries are great...
customer_reviews.author: ted leclert

customer_reviews.title: puts air impacts to shame
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mac Composite Air impact and got this while i wait on my new air compressor to come in for the shop and have to say i might not got go back this Milwaukee fuel has way more power. Even out of the box with a half charged battery i used it to take a front end apart in a car, this tool is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: The nut busting torque rating of this tool is accurate. I have yet to find anything it cannot remove. Very powerful and handy tool to have. I highly recommend this over any pneumatic impact equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a unit!
customer_reviews.text: after years of work tons of drops and rattling around in trucks my impact is still going strong and keeping up with air power tools, you really cant go wrong with team red
customer_reviews.author: Bearman

customer_reviews.title: But I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding light, This is a must buy for DIY and garages, No more air hoses to remove stubborn lug nuts, or rust bolts, only issue is it has a hard time fitting in to time spaces sometimes. But I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Great impact.
customer_reviews.text: Great impact. Came with nice hard case. Has great torque for what I used it for. Very useful and saved me a lot of time. Own and work with multiple Milwaukee tools and never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic, I replaced a Ryobi one with it. No comparison as the Milwaukee just does so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very amazing impact gun ... the impressive batteries... still have the first charge when I bought em
customer_reviews.author: Rizwan Tarar

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for an air compressor and air impact.
customer_reviews.text: So much power, if your working on cars i can't imagine anything this impact can't handle. Battery life is great, and the impact fits my hand better than other brands. I recommend this to any auto enthusiasts who want a portable powerful impact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: My husband loves using this brand while working on haul trucks. He prefers it to snap on actually and wants to switch all his tools over to this brand
customer_reviews.author: rebecca chavez

customer_reviews.title: I will try to be as polite as, possible ...
customer_reviews.text: I will try to be as polite as , possible ,THIS IS ONE BADDD MAMMA JAMMA thanks Milwaukee ,from mechanics everywhere WE needed this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retired my air impact
customer_reviews.text: After using one on the construction site for years I decided to get one for the garage. I'll never pick up an air impact again. Takes off the lug nuts on my F350 with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Schafer

customer_reviews.title: More than enough power!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent torque wrench! More than enough power to remove very rusty truck suspension nuts. Batteries have great capacity. Very well made, but I purchased the rubber protector to save it from scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to an air wrenche
customer_reviews.text: I'll never go back to my Air wrench again. Took my Disk Harrow apart in no time in the field, saved me hours of hand wrenching. More power than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lefemine

customer_reviews.title: Have only had a chance to use this impact on ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only had a chance to use this impact on lug nuts so far, it took them off my truck with no struggle at all. Seems to have an extreme amount of power i'm sure i will not be let down when I get to put it to the test on a axle nut or something. I am not a mechanic just a DIYer when it comes to fixing my vehicles. This impact was the alternative to buying an air compressor. Lots of reviews online to back up the power this impact has.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only impact wrench you will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar Hill

customer_reviews.title: This wrench is loaded with power worth every penny. ...
customer_reviews.text: This wrench is loaded with power worth every penny. A little heavy for a hand tool but with all of the other positive thing it can do it a very small trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. No issues to report yet
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. No issues to report yet. I've used it for a few jobs already and plan on using it on many more. Impact has a lot of power and the convenience of battery power is great compared to air tools! Even the case is high quality! Good stuff to report here.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: They come from the factory with an anticorrossion compound that prevents a good connection between the pack and the gun
customer_reviews.text: This thing has not met a bolt that it cannot break. I was on the edge between getting and air impact and this. After using it for awhile working on cars and trailers I know I made the right choice. Well worth the money. Pro tip: if the battery packs do not work out of the box cycle them about 20 times on and off the gun. They come from the factory with an anticorrossion compound that prevents a good connection between the pack and the gun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful as my $300 air gun if not more.
customer_reviews.text: As powerfully as my air awsome power and can through it in the bed for trail side repairs battery holds a real good long charge best tool I've bought in years would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rick rose

customer_reviews.title: This tool is great. I use it every day

customer_reviews.title: Almost too much torque !
customer_reviews.text: Why more powerful the I expected. Second rig I tryed it on was a Jeep mudder with crusty rusty lug nuts. Couple nuts were rusted on the Milwaukee stripped them . Oops. They say you can never have to much power? Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Motoxroc

customer_reviews.title: Have had it almost 2 years now and no issues. Great tool!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily as a heavy equipment technician and absolutely love this impact. I haven't had any problems with the impact or the batteries. It has lots of power, a coworker bought a new Snap on 1/2in impact and this Milwaukee will remove bolts and nuts that his will not.

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy and is a hard worker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an IR 7150 in hopes it would perform some close to what the IR did and was I and several of my co-workers were surprised, this tool is an animal. Very good buy and is a hard worker, out performed the IR. Thanks Milwaukee.

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool, works better then my pneumatic ingersollrand. Removes every bolt, no matter how rusty.

customer_reviews.text: A gift for son. Very strong, easy to grab and use on little jobs being cordless. Had it a year and completely satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool! This wrench puts out more power than ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tool! This wrench puts out more power than most air tools on the market. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every tech
customer_reviews.text: I am plain and simply AMAZED by this. Everybody who works on a car should have this! Did front and rear brakes ,wheel lug nuts is a easy... the caliper bracket i was worried about but it took them off with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: For sure buy it.
customer_reviews.text: A really good tool. As a mechanic and a DIY home owner this tool comes in very handy and it's more powerful than other impact wrenches from: Dewalt, Ryobi, and Ridgid. I can bust loose customers' rust frozen bolts and lugnuts with ease using Milwaukee's impact wrench and Milwaukee's impact socket sets. These 4xc Amh bats that come with the hard case kit are awesome aswell. they charge in about 45min but last for about a week of daily use with out strength drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This made it so easy. Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. Was so tired of using a tire wrench (and cheater pipe) on farm tires.... This made it so easy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: HickmanProductions

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous Power. Bought to raise and lower boat lift and other jobs requiring extra torque.
customer_reviews.author: Don Pleau

customer_reviews.title: Great power, takes rusted 30+ year old lug nuts ...
customer_reviews.text: Great power, takes rusted 30+ year old lug nuts off my project car in 1-3 hits. Heavy, but worth it. Great battery life - I used the same charge for quick and also some not so quick jobs for 4 weeks. Friction ring took some getting used to, its just different, that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing torque, will take off lugs on a tractor-trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing torque, will take off lugs on a tractor-trailer though heavy no hose or cord to get in the way

customer_reviews.title: Love Milwaukee
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with Milwaukee Products in my eyes. I own many of their products as a mechanic and they have yet to fail me.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This wrench was a gift to a friend. It is great but was still not able to get the lug nuts off the truck he was working on. But this product is really great. Makes life easier for self car repair.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This impact gun is a beast! I took it to the junkyard to try out on those dreaded Honda Accord crankshaft pulley bolts that even with an air gun some people have trouble removing, this impact gun will remove them easily, same goes for the axle shaft nuts. Other than the Ingersoll Rand W7150-K2 There is nothing that comes even closer to the same torque that this impact gun has, not snapon, makita or craftsman.

I have even compared this to a 3/4 drive pneumatic impact that failed to torque bolts Milwaukee can't loosen. thanks for rushing this to me guys, It will help make my work a lot easier.

It's just seems too lose and when I spin the drill with just the bit on, it falls out. I would get the pin version over this, just my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a great rechargeable that works and will last
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this impact for a year. If your looking for a cheap impact, this isn't it. If your looking for a great rechargeable that works and will last, this IS it. It is simply AWESOME. Impressive battery life, beyond powerful, worth every dime and then some. Can not find 1 thing negative. 8-2019: Still have it, still AWESOME, still AMAZING battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Killer!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Rotated the tires on my F250, still a full charge. Those nuts (8 per wheel) are torqued to 160 ft-lb. It laughs at tough nuts. Low power mode keeps you from making a mistake when you put the nuts back on. Now I don't need to drag the air hose around the garage, or move a vehicle close to the garage to us my air-driven impact gun. Wish I'd bought one years ago! Update: This is the one tool I have at the ready in my home garage or in the truck when I am headed to the track. You guys who think it's a little heavy need to either wrench more, or gym more.
customer_reviews.author: F250 Driver

customer_reviews.title: That it out beats most of the competitors
customer_reviews.text: The drill has good torque and works well what I don't like about it is it took a long time for shipping to get it to me well over what I was told it would be here

Even my compressor tool wouldn't budge the bolts holding on the blades. This tool had the blades off in seconds - literally. Unbelievable tool and I can't believe I did so much without it previously. I was skeptical...but no longer. i

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tool removed the lug nuts from a ten hole budd dump truck without any problem

customer_reviews.title: is a good tool.
customer_reviews.text: I work on a 2002 Honda axle shaft and getting the 36 millimeter nut was not a problem using the 2nd speed, is a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ocampo Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good tool. I use it all day in an active shop. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of break away force for getting those stuck or seized bolts loose and the battery life is just amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I am a service technician and I use this impact for wheels, subframe bolts, axle nuts, ect and it has never let me down. Plenty of break away force for getting those stuck or seized bolts loose and the battery life is just amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: All kinds of power!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to break rusty bolts and nuts loose. Did everything I asked it to do. Lots of power
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's better than I had hoped. I would highly recommend this impact wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T ORDER FROM Neandertool
customer_reviews.text: works great but one of the batteries came defective returned the battery still havent gotten a new one will change to 5 star after i get the battery and it works. Update: 6+ months no replacement battery. DON'T ORDER FROM Neandertool
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

product_meta.title: Milwaukee 2763-22 M18 1/2" Inch Impact Wrench
product_meta.description: M18 fuel, 1 or 2" high torque impact wrench with friction ring kit, superior performance delivers up to 700' or lb. of maximum fastening torque, up to 1,100' or lb. of nut Busting torque and up to 2 times more runtime, Powerstate Brushless motor, Red link Plus intelligence allows the operator to choose between 2 fastening modes, mode 1 delivers up to 100' or lb. of maximum fastening torque and mode 2 up to 700' or lb. maximum fastening torque, Red Lithium XC 4.0 battery pack provides superior pack construction, 1 or 2" anvil with friction ring for fast and easy socket changes, includes two M18 Red Lithium XC 4.0 extended capacity battery packs, M18 and M12 multi-voltage charger and carrying case.
feature_bullets: Superior performance: Delivers up to 700 ft-lbs of maximum fastening torque, up to 1,100 ft-lbs of nut-busting torque and up to 2X more runtime
POWERSTATE Brushless Motor: Outpowers competitors yet runs cooler with no wearable components
REDLINK PLUS Intelligence: allows the operator to choose between 2 fastening modes with Milwaukees proprietary DRIVE CONTROL feature.
REDLITHIUM XC 4.0 Battery Pack: Provides superior pack construction, electronics and performance to deliver 2X more runtime
1/2 Inch Anvil with friction ring for fast, easy socket changes
